ComicInfo.Summary:
I Stalk by Night!: When a judge dons a pair of black gloves that belonged to a serial killer, he finds that he cannot remove them and is forced to commit murder.
House of Horror: A man traveling through the forest comes upon a house occupied by werewolves.
Murder at Midnight!: A grave-digger ladies' man is pursued by the spirits of the women he drove to suicide by his love 'em and leave 'em ways.
The Living Dead: A man drains the blood of young women and uses the hormones to prolong his life.
ComicInfo.Title: I Stalk by Night!; House of Horror; Murder at Midnight!; The Living Dead
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mike Sekowsky,Gene Colan,Hank Chapman,Jay Scott Pike,Mike Sekowsky,Gene Colan,Hank Chapman,Jay Scott Pike
ComicInfo.Inker: George Klein,Jay Scott Pike,George Klein,Jay Scott Pike
